attributes.action: keep the Angling times Winter league final on a natural venue.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more angling competitions are being moved to commercial venues which i believe will have an adverse effect on our future national sides.

The Angling Times winter league final has always been on a natural final and thats the way it should stay.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
